content: **materials and tools for crocheting ** * 4-ply yarn white orange for nose and red for scarf and hat * black thread for embroidery eye * hook size 2 mm * needle for sewing on details scissors thin needle for eyes embroidery * polyester stuffing * pink chalk pastel or blush to tint cheeks optional **abbreviations ** magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch increase increase crochet 2 single_crochet in one stitch decrease invisible decrease crochet 2 single_crochet in front loops together chain chain stitch blo crochet stitches back loops only … *n repeat instruction in brackets n times r row/round
